item.description:
We will be watching What the Bleep! and having a discussion afterwards. This is a very good film that helps us understand from a scientific viewpoint how we all manage to link with spirit!

We have people come who are not members of Meetup, so please do not think that because it does not look like anyone else is coming that you will be the only one! Please come ready for good food, good conversation, and a great time with like minded folks!

dance in the light of spirit!

Susan
item.name: What the Bleep!
